hpcsummary

The HPCToolkit Performance Tools

2018/07/11

Version develop

hpcsummary provides statistics about an HPCToolkit measurement database generated by hpcrun(1) or hpclink(1) .

Table of Contents

  • Synopsis
  • Description
  • Arguments
    • Options: Informational
    • Options: Output
  • Examples
  • See Also
  • Version
  • License and Copyright
  • Authors

Synopsis

hpcsummary [options] measurement-database

Description

hpcsummary provides statistics about an HPCToolkit measurement database generated by hpcrun(1) .

Arguments

measurement-database
A directory path specifying an hpcrun measurement database to be summarized.

Options: Informational

-V, --version
Print version information.

-h, --help
Print help.

Options: Output

-a, --all
Include summary info for blocked and errant samples

Examples

To provide summary statistics for the measurement database hpctoolkit-app-measurements, issue the following command: 

    hpcsummary hpctoolkit-app-measurements

See Also

hpctoolkit(1) .

Version

Version: develop
